original_title: National Theatre Live: I'm Not Running
overview: Pauline Gibson has spent her life as a doctor, the inspiring leader of a local health campaign. When she crosses paths with her old boyfriend, a stalwart loyalist in Labour Party politics, she’s faced with an agonising decision.  What’s involved in sacrificing your private life and your piece of mind for something more than a single issue? Does she dare?
tagline: An explosive new play by David Hare, premiering at the National Theatre and broadcast live to cinemas.
title: National Theatre Live: I'm Not Running
